comments.comment: liyala thiyena de kiyava ganna  puluvanda kiyala neveyi karala thiyena veda balapan dodavanne nethuva.   LTTE paraddanna siyalu pahasu kam sanvidhaanaya kale ethumaa.  Eeta passe loku sanvardhanayak kale ethumaa.  Eeye video ekak mama dekka methumaa kala sanvardhana vyaapruthi 60 k.  Umbala karapu ekak kiyapan balanna.  Janathaava PET yanthraya ganna ekathu karapu salli valatath vidinnayi heduve.  Comments daala thibunaa evata thava thava eva ekathu karala.  Ballo biruvata handa paathata ganna behene.  Den oya dodavanne irisiyaavata.  KOchchara dedevvath vedak ne.  Denthopi kiyapu boru ekin eka eli venava.  Thajudeen meruve kavuda kiyala ada hetama eli veyi.  Ekaneligoda case ekath ehema thamayi .  Den samaharu rateth nohita yanava umbalage veradi niyoga pilipedapuva ahu venavata baye.  Karana kalata pav meeriy  a mee se vindina kalata duk dedi veyi gini se

Uba lokkath ubawageama boru jathika alaya thiyana eakeak. Eakanea uddean panala gihin  American purawasikam arageana baibalea atha thiya deawingea namean diuruwea. Okkotama kalin kiyapan ara boruwata ainkarai kiyapau American purawasi kama ayi karagannea kiyala nikan ponnayeak weannea neathi wa.

archie lak Ayi ban gota rata chineata wikunanakota ubata Oya dan thearean eaka thearunea neadda. Somawathiya American samagamata wikunanakota ubata Oya aurudu 5000 urumaya mathak unnea neadda. Ratea neadan tikaharanakota panawa pansala kadala hamuduruwoo ealawala eadam tika horakan karanakota ubea jathika alaya readda assea hangilada thibunea. Shariyawishaya widayala hadannea mulgala thiyanakota muntika badurdeenta wilpathuwa  kapannea deannakota Arabi karayanta siripadea eadamtika deanakota Uba thathagea eata deakeada hitiyea. Nikan boru jathika alean dala ragannea eapa Uba jathiyata adareanam American horagotagea puka leawanawada. Eatha ubalath untheanka tika tika horakan karana podi horu.
archie lak muta witharak neamea horagotatath 17 yannea thanak hoyagannea kiyahan
Munta  gahnna ape eun ape hda euntama jatiyata tkak hri ladi unta gahi

comments.comment: Who cares, US President Donald Trump is not a good public speaker. No matter what Gota is a Great leader. 1000 times better than other guys.
comments.author: U Ga

comments.comment: Does this person know all about medicine even though he is the minister of health? It does not mean to say that a person should know everything. Leader should have leadership qualities no knowledge about all arts and sciences that exist under the sun. we have seen how this person has behaved when media people questioned him. This is the worst person in Sri Lanka who should never be in any government. Wait and see what will happen to people like him who over evaluate himself.
comments.author: gavi 876

replies.replyComment:
gavi 876  I am sure you know that favouring their family is the norm for any Srilankan politician. There is nothing new. But I trust you understand what is family rule. Having one brother as president another as prime minister and the third one as speaker and rest of the sons and brothers as ministers is what a family rule is about! I am sure you are matured enough to understand the implications. We do not want to go back to the days of Kings when this was last practised. Having the Executive, Legislative and the Judiciary in one control is disaster for any democracy.
Freedom of Speech is what makes one live with dignity. Give me freedom or give me death is what intelligent minds would say!

I am sure Ranajn Fernando who tries to white wash this government that has destroyed most of what people need. Is it enough for the people to have freedom of speech? Can they survive with that? I don't say that a family rule is the best, then again, how about this minister? Doesn't he favor family? Is he a saint politician. From my point of view, this politician one of the key members who should be excluded in Sri Lankan politics.

gavi 876  I agree with you that none of these fellow politicians are with any halos! This guy too has plenty of black marks and fraudulent activities. But then we in Srilanka are left with a Hobson‚Äôs choice. Do we settle for a weak and indecisive Government that doesn‚Äôt threaten our personal safety and freedom of  speech or surrender to a family rule that is threatening to blast every voice and leave us scattered cowering with fright for personal safety from an armed state machinery?
To me the choice is obvious!  How about you?
